name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Levels confirmed on site
Acceptance Criteria - Set out in accordance with design drawings or site conditions
Verifying Document - Visual Inspection / On Site Verification
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Bondeck or Conventional Suspended Slab
Acceptance Criteria - Slab type is identified Bondeck / Conventional
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Confirmation of Formwork Strength Requirements
Acceptance Criteria - Formwork is suitable for placement of wet concrete
○ Bondeck – Steel / Block Walls installed and Props as per design
○ Conventional – Formwork support system installed as per engineering design
Verifying Document - Engineering Design (if required), Bondeck installed in accordance with span tables
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Concrete slab formwork is set up to architectural levels
○ Level and alignment of beams is as per architectural design
Verifying Document - Visual Inspection, Client Inspection Survey (If req)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Structural Reinforcement as per Structural Design documentation / additional SDA
Acceptance Criteria - Installation of dowels satisfies embedment
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspection of reo and Services conduit check
Acceptance Criteria - Steel reinforcement in accordance with design documentation. All services installed.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Inspection of jointing detail
Acceptance Criteria - Joints installed in accordance with Design requirements
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Concrete is poured to required levels and strength
Acceptance Criteria - Strength and finish requirement met. Finished level within tolerances.
Verifying Document - Visual inspection Strength Test
